1.content:
David looked up at his brother's college and was very excited. He was also very grateful that Evan, and his principal was letting his stay there.

He walked up to the front door and entered. It was really busy, but he recognized his big brother right away.

"Evan!" you call out.

"Hey there! I'm glad you decided to actually come here," Evan said.

"This place looks awesome. So, where's your dorm?" I asked.

He led me down a hallway upstairs and went inside his dorm. His roommate wasn't there.

"Where's your roommate?" I asked.

"I don't know. No one does. He disappeared suddenly, like 2 monthes ago," Evan explained.

I wondered about that for awhile.

"Hey David, I have to go to class now. Will you be fine here til I get back?" Evan asked.

"Yeah, sure," I said.

"Okay, I'll be back at four," David said.

Once he left, I looked around the whole dorm. I felt kind of thirsty, so I opened the fridge to see if Evan had anything to drink. Of course not. Before I closed the fridge, I noticed a small bottle in the back of the fridge.

"What's this?" I asked myself.

12.content:
David was in awe of how huge everything was! Always having been shorter than Evan, David was five foot ten (70 inches). Suddenly being reduced to a hundred-fortieth of that was a major experience. Everything around him was one hundred forty times as large: a paperback book on the floor stretched 82 feet long, a pencil was 46 feet long, a dime was nearly five feet wide and had thickness that Dave could actually see. He gingerly walked up to it and stepped atop the dime, realizing that he was now higher up. It was mindblowing that a dime, something he used to be able to fit in his pocket, could now be like a podium to him.

David struggled to recall the series of events. He had guzzled a bottle of something, sat down, and...taken a nap? Or had he passed out? He couldn't shake the feeling that he has passed out and fallen off the couch, because he was now on the carpeted floor, not the seat cushion of the couch. Was that a shrinking solution or something? Somehow, though, he was still fully clothed. He had a feeling that if he hadn't been wearing his shoes, the thick carpet would have been hard to navigate. It felt like thick moss under him, he could barely walk.

He had to find that bottle! Should he go to the minifridge in the corner, or go somewhere that Evan would find him?

He wondered if the bottle was even still in the fridge. Had he finished it or not? He couldn't remember.

On the other hand, there was an area right by the door where Evan might notice him. There were two pairs of shoes by the door, black flip-flops and New Balance running shoes. He wondered if Evan would see him when he entered the room and took off his shoes.

He needed to decide soon, because, looking up at the Big-Ben-sized clock on the wall, David noticed that it was 3:50. He must have been asleep for longer than he'd thought; Evan would be here soon.

Suddenly, he heard a squeak from under Evan's bed. Squinting, David gasped. He could make out what looked like a jail, a tiny cage, with someone inside. A shrunken person? David flashed back to what Evan had said about his roommate. Disappeared? Or shrunk...

choices: Evening - Evan comes home to check up
125.content:
David decided that maybe going for that cage was a bad idea, and things happen when you go to the shoes or the fridge, and he wasn't going to stay on the floor. He looked around and decided that maybe the bathroom would be a good idea. As he made his way to the bathroom, which took longer than he thought, he thought about alot of things that happened.


A couple hours later...
125.title: Your choice

choices: Both Dave and your older brother
the giant pair of your underwear
13.content:
When you awake you look at the clock and see that it is passed four and your borhter has not come back yet, thinking that he must have meet one of his friends and that they are just talking you turn on the TV and start to watch it. When your brother does not come home by seven you start to get really worried. As you go to pick up the phone to call his cell someone knocks on the door.
You open it to find the campus security officer holding a bag.
"Do you know the occupants of this room?" he ask you when you say you do and ask if there is a problem he informs you that this pile of clothes was found a while ago and the identification that was in them said that they belonged to your older brother. He asks you the last time you saw him and after making a note he leaves you the clothes.
As you head back to the bed you start to feel dizzy and become lose conscious. When you awake your three inches tall, naked and face to face with...
13.title: Delayed shrink

choices: Wait until Dave comes back, then hitch a ride on his foot.
132.content:
"Please, David, wake up! C'mon, rise and shine!"

Evan keeps shaking you until he finally realizes that you are awake. You blink your eyes a few times, then realize that both of you are naked, and Evan is sitting on you. He gets off and lets you stand up.

"Evan, what the hell happened to us? How'd we get so small?"

"I'm not sure. I think it's something in the grape sodas in the fridge. You had one and I had one earlier. I pulled you out of your clothes when I realized what happened. We've gotta contact my roommate, Dave, before he drinks any of it."

"How do you propose we do that?"

"I dunno, we could... I got it! When Dave comes in, he always briefly stands at the counter and goes through his mail. During that brief time, we could either climb up his foot or try and get his attention from the counter. It would be hard to climb to the counter, but it would be easier to get his attention faster."
132.title: A Small problem

info.brief_description: While your visiting your big brother at his college...you shrink!
info.description:
While David was visiting his older brother Evan at his college, he shrinks! Now, he has to avoid everything!

Basic Rules:
1)Keep the character small enough no one can see him...or just make him oblivious to the college students.

2)No female interaction at all.

3)No growing.

4)David may leave his brother's dorm to go elsewhere.

PLEASE ADD!!

Have Fun! Anything goes!
